en.title: My Portfolio
en.description: Some of the recent projects I worked on.

breachprotocol.io is an online tool that helps Cyberpunk 2077 players solve Breach Protocol puzzles. It uses multi-modal LLMs to analyze screenshots of the puzzle grid and then calculates the most efficient sequence of codes to complete the breach, saving players time and frustration.

private.title: through-the-ages.com
private.shortDescription: Compare before and after photos of iconic places.

en.description: through-the-ages.com lets you explore the past and present of any location with side-by-side before-and-after photos. Users can upload historical and modern images from the same spot, compare them with an interactive slider, and browse a map of transformations over time. Discover how places evolve and contribute to a growing visual history of the world!

private.title: Blitzerheld
private.shortDescription: Let Alexa warn you of radar-traps.

en.description: Blitzerheld is your reliable driving companion that helps you maintain appropriate speeds by alerting you to upcoming speed cameras. It works by comparing your route or location with comprehensive speed camera databases, providing precise locations of speed monitoring systems along your way.

private.title: markusziller.de
private.shortDescription: This very website, built in Vue 3.

en.description: This very website, built with Vue 3 and Bootstrap 5. Optimized for UX and responsiveness.

GenMail is a hands-on workshop project that demonstrates how to build a generative AI-powered email assistant using AWS serverless technologies and Large Language Models (LLMs). The project teaches participants how to create a scalable backend system that can help compose, summarize, and analyze emails more efficiently.
